price: Nnipa pii nso nnye nni, sε wobͻ ho mmͻden sεn ara mpo a.
arabic: وَمَآ أَكۡثَرُ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā aktharu al-nāsi walaw ḥaraṣta bimu'minīna
